author: Darrell Etherington
title: New study casts doubt on hyrdoxychloroquine’s effectiveness in treating coronavirus
description: In a prime example of why President Trump shouldn’t be endorsing any unproven potential treatments for the novel coronavirus behind the current global pandemic, a new small-scale study by researchers in China indicates that the antimalarial drug hydroxychloro…
